originalText.text: I initially got a diamonds and sapphires ring from from Otis On Park and I was super happy when I received it. I more recently purchased matching earrings and I can confirm my positive feedback, I’m very satisfied. They are high-quality and worth the money, the prices are correct and realistic. Michela has been very professional during the whole process, always available for more details and images and a very pleasant person to deal with. I definitely recommend her and her services.

text.text: I initially got a diamonds and sapphires ring from from Otis On Park and I was super happy when I received it. originalText.text:
I bought two emerald earrings from Otis. Service was very professional, fast and Michela answered quickly all my questions and provided me with all the additional info I asked.
When received, the earrings matched perfectly the pictures I saw and the description. Very beautiful and great price. The handwritten card, which I received together with the earrings, was a little touch that I much appreciated and it's symptom of the great care Michela puts in her job.
Can only recommend. Will buy more.

originalText.text: From now on I will always source my jewelry through Otis on Park. Excellent customer service, very personal approach, advice and handling, very fast delivery and transaction process. High quality, very transparent, and honest pricing. Absolutely recommend Otis on Park for any jewelry purchase!
